Name: Bolt Group Shear Strength
Description: Nominal shear capacity of bolt group (Rn = N × Fnv × Ab)

Name: Bolt Bearing Strength
Description: Lesser of bearing and tear-out controls

Name: Bolt Cross-Section Area
Description: Nominal cross-sectional area of bolt from diameter

Name: Bolt Spacing Check
Description: AISC J3.2 minimum spacing compliance

Name: Bolt Edge Distance Check
Description: AISC J3.3 minimum edge-distance compliance

Name: Fillet Weld Effective Throat
Description: Effective throat of equal-leg fillet weld

Name: Fillet Weld Linear Capacity
Description: Weld metal shear capacity per unit length (Rn/L)

Name: Required Weld Length
Description: Minimum total weld length required for shear demand

Name: Base Plate Required Area
Description: Min base plate area = column load / allowable bearing

Name: Base Plate Thickness
Description: AISC Design Guide 1 base plate thickness

Name: Bolt Group Cost
Description: Total cost bolts + washers + nuts

Name: Connection Plate Cost
Description: Plate cost from mass and unit price

Name: Weld Cost Estimate
Description: Weld fabrication cost from length

Name: Total Connection Cost
Description: Fully loaded connection cost

Name: Wood Bolt Allowable Capacity
Description: Adjusted lateral design value for single bolt (NDS Ch 12)

Name: Lag Screw Min Penetration Check
Description: NDS 10.3.2 minimum penetration compliance

Name: Lag Screw Allowable Capacity
Description: Adjusted lateral design value single lag screw

Name: Hurricane Tie Quantity Per Rafter
Description: Min hurricane ties per rafter connection

Name: Ledger Bolt Spacing Check
Description: IRC R507.1 max ledger fastener spacing 600mm

Name: Ledger Bolt Count
Description: Number of ledger bolts for given ledger length

Name: Hold-Down Uplift Capacity Check
Description: Hold-down rated capacity vs design uplift demand

Name: Joist Hanger Cost Per Bay
Description: Total hanger hardware cost for one bay

Name: Hold-Down Cost Per Wall
Description: Two hold-downs + two anchor bolts per shear wall

Name: Total Wood Connection Cost
Description: Sum of all wood-connection hardware in one dwelling

Name: Mudsill Anchor Spacing Check
Description: IRC R403.1 max 1830mm spacing between anchors

Name: Mudsill Anchor Count
Description: Number of mudsill anchors for perimeter length

Name: Anchor Bolt Embedment Check
Description: ACI 318 min embedment for J/L cast-in anchors

Name: Foundation Anchor Cost
Description: Total mudsill anchor hardware cost

Name: Seismic Anchor Uplift Check
Description: ASCE 7 seismic uplift capacity ≥ 1.5× design uplift

Name: Waterproofed Surface Area
Description: Total waterproofed area: floor slab + all below-grade walls

Name: Membrane Overlap Length
Description: Total extra membrane area consumed by lap joints

Name: Sheet Membrane Rolls Required
Description: Number of membrane rolls accounting for waste

Name: Liquid Membrane Coverage
Description: Number of buckets / containers for liquid membrane

Name: Sealant Joint Total Length
Description: Total linear metres of sealant joints

Name: Sealant Tubes Required
Description: Number of sealant tubes from total joint length

Name: Liquid Membrane Installed Cost
Description: Material + labour for liquid-applied membrane

Name: Sheet Membrane Installed Cost
Description: Material + labour for sheet membrane

Name: Window Flashing Perimeter
Description: Total flashing run around one window opening

Name: Roof Valley Flashing Length
Description: Valley flashing length along the slope

Name: Step Flashing Piece Count
Description: Number of step-flashing pieces for one slope run

Name: Vent Pipe Boot Count
Description: Total roof penetrations needing vent boots

Name: Flashing Sheet Quantity
Description: Number of flat flashing sheets from total run

Name: Expansion Joint Cover Length
Description: Total linear length of expansion-joint covers

Name: Window Flashing Cost
Description: Total window-flashing material cost

Name: Total Flashing Cost
Description: Sum of all flashing sub-costs for the building
